# ğŸ” Steganography-Image-Encryption

**Steganography & Encryption using Python** | This project can hides secret messages inside images using **LSB Steganography** and **AES-128 encryption (Fernet)**. The encryption key is **automatically generated, saved, and required for decryption**. Perfect for **secure communication & data hiding**.

## ğŸ“Œ Features:
âœ”ï¸ Encrypts messages before hiding them in images  
âœ”ï¸ Uses **Fernet encryption (AES-128, CBC mode with HMAC)**  
âœ”ï¸ Automatically generates & saves a secure key (`key.key`)  
âœ”ï¸ Requires the key for decryption  
âœ”ï¸ Works in **VS Code (Python 3.x required)**
